mapper.select: select id from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
select no from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, hobby=#{hobby}, job=#{job}, age=#{age}, info=#{info} where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, email, tel, hobby, job, age, info, oFileName, sFileName) values( #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{hobby}, #{job}, #{age}, #{info}, #{oFileName}, #{sFileName} )
